recordTypes.description: All DUMPSTERS/PODS  placed in the Town of Arlington require a permit regardless of their location.

recordTypes.description: Inspectional Services (ISD) enforces the State Building Codes and Town Bylaws.

recordTypes.name: Waiver - Fossil Fuel Free Bylaw
recordTypes.description:
The Town of Arlington may grant a waiver subject to the requirements of the bylaw. Waiver application for Fossil Free Bylaw for projects that are deemed financially infeasible or impractical to implement.

Please see Select Board guidance: https://www.arlingtonma.gov/home/showpublisheddocument/70169

recordTypes.name: Tent Permit
recordTypes.description:
The Building Permit - Tent application is for residential and commercial projects.  

If you have questions when completing the application please contact the office at 781-316-3390.
